Articles.Content: Folks i am having an issue where my panels are auto deploying once in orbit. Specifically my payload panels the second i decouple it from my ship. This is causing the panels to open inside the bay and as such destroying them. Is there a way to stop this?
Are you using MechJeb? If so, go to the MechJeb Settings menu and click Disable Auto-Deploy.
That option is disabled in mechjeb.
